controllers

Interface IController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEntityController, BotanicSystemController, CustomerController, ExhibitionController, GeoRegionController, StatusController, TimberController, TimberOriginController

    public interface IController
    Common IController interface for all persistent type controllers.
    Author:
    mbsusr01 ninja-superbowl 14.04.2017 mbsusr01

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dto getDtoFromSession(ninja.session.Session session)
      Provides a Dto (Data Transfer Object) instance with bowl data from session instance.
      ninja.Result list(ninja.Context context)
      List all items of a specific type.
      void putDtoIntoSession(Dto dto, ninja.session.Session session)
      Put data from a user interface form into the session instance.
      void putFormIntoSession(Form form, ninja.session.Session session)
      Puts bowl data from a user interface form into the session instance.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        ninja.Result list(ninja.Context context)
        List all items of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        context - the Ninja Context instance
        Returns:
        the item list

      • getDtoFromSession

        Dto getDtoFromSession(ninja.session.Session session)
        Provides a Dto (Data Transfer Object) instance with bowl data from session instance.
        Parameters:
        session - the Ninja Session instance
        Returns:
        instance of Dto with data from session

      • putDtoIntoSession

        void putDtoIntoSession(Dto dto,
                       ninja.session.Session session)
        Put data from a user interface form into the session instance.

        Checks every value from session instance for null value. If a value is null it will be replaced by a whitespace character.

        Parameters:
        dto - the Dto (Data Transfer Object) instance
        session - the Ninja Session instance

      • putFormIntoSession

        void putFormIntoSession(Form form,
                        ninja.session.Session session)
        Puts bowl data from a user interface form into the session instance.

        Checks every bowl value from session instance for null value. If bowl value is null it will be replaced by a whitespace character.

        Parameters:
        form - the Form instance
        session - the Ninja Session instance
